item.description:
Event: Start the New Year off right and enjoy some 90 minutes of ice skating with music and fun at the Kelly Outdoor Rink in Jamaica Plain. This is going to be a great way to start to get back into shape after the break we all have taken for the Holiday Season

Meet: At 6 p.m. at the Kelly Outdoor Rink at 1 Marbury Terrace in Jamaica Plain, 02130. The nearest MBTA stop is the Stony Brook stop on the Orange Line. Parking is available in the lot at the end of Marbury Terrace.  It will be a night in the outdoors

Trip Coordinator: Contact the TC Irina Rozina, with questions. Messages won't be answered during Shabbat, from Friday at 4 p.m. through Saturday at 5:30 p.m. For information about the rink call: 617-727-7000.

RSVP: By Friday, Jan. 4th at 4 p.m.

Cost: There is a $2 fee for both admission and skate rentals. There is a $5 non-member fee, which can be credited toward a Mosaic membership costing $25.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to Irina and she will let you know the plans are

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Start the New Year off right with an Evening of Outdoor Ice Skating
